text: Unadushyirireho amategeko meza hano ku isi no ku munsi w’imperuka, rwose turakugarukiye tukwicuzaho. (Allah) aravuga ati “Ibihano byanjye mbihanisha uwo nshaka kandi n’impuhwe zanjye zigera ku biremwa byose. (Izo mpuhwe) nzazigenera abagandukira Allah, bakanatanga amaturo ndetse na ba bandi bemera ibimenyetso byacu.”
